title: Rewriting an Android game
paragraphs: I programmed Pictologo, a children's game in Java for Android mobiles. I now want to rewrite this code into a React Native app.
Thanks to React Native, I will target both the iOS and the Android devices, with a high percentage of code re-use: I'm hoping for more than 90%.
The app will be performant unlike a Phonegap WebView container that renders an HTML5 app.
The content of the game is currently hard coded. I want to move this content to a RESTful web API that can be 100% re-used by all platforms (Android, iOS and web).

title: Making electronic gadgets
paragraphs: I've started making electronic gadgets with an Arduino starter kit.
This is a nice hobby to spend time on and there's a tie-in with web development and processing data in apps.
Ultimately I would love to build a fully automated system that does something useful, like entertaining my cats when I'm not home.

title: Learning Jenkins
paragraphs: I have used Travis and Wercker continuous integration tools in the past.
My partner wants to learn how o use Jenkins, so I agreed to learn it too.

title: Learning Arabic
paragraphs: I was born and grew up in France, but my parents are from Morocco and Algeria.
They never taught me the Arabic language; learning it is proving more challenging than working out how to use a new Javascript library!
Still, I will get there; there is no pressure so I'm taking my time with this one.
